Title: Michael Jackson Dance Party
Description: The story of the King of Pop as it plays out on the dancefloor, with his own anthems, hits by his closest contemporaries in the 70s disco scene and by those who follow, bravely, his mesmerizing footsteps.
Artists on this station: Michael Jackson, The Jackson 5, Prince, Justin Timberlake, Stevie Wonder, Janet Jackson, Mark Ronson, Jason Derulo, The Weeknd, Daft Punk, Robin Thicke, Deniece Williams, SWV, A Boogie wit da Hoodie, Lipps Inc, Usher,
